LanguageData.ManhunterPackArrived:
A pack of man-hunting {0} have entered the area! Driven to kill by the mighty animal sage Wes, they will roam the region, hunting for humanoid flesh.

They won't attack doors unless they see someone go through the door. Hide inside and you'll be safe. They also won't attack powered-off turrets, so turn your turrets off to save them.

The {0} will leave the area in one or two days. You can hide and wait them out, or fight them.
LanguageData.LetterFarmAnimalsWanderIn: A group of {0}, inspired by the mighty animal sage Wes, have wandered into the area.\n\nWes has trained them well and they are joining the colony.
